snippet: Cate Blanchett is known for playing women who are just barely holding it together. In life, she’s firmly in control.
abstract: Profile of actress and style icon Cate Blanchett, who is currently starring in her husband Andrew Upton's adaptation of Chekhov's The Present at Sydney Theatre Company.

byline.contributor: Hair by Anthony Turner at Art Partner. Makeup by Linda Cantello at Joe Management for Giorgio Armani Beauty. Set design by Andy Hillman at Streeters. Production: Brachfeld Paris. Manicurist: Tracylee at Tim Howard Management. Digital operator: Edouard Malfettes. On-set retoucher: Virginie Thebault. Photo assistants: Antoni Ciufo, Florent Vindimian and Léa de Bartillat. Stylist’s assistants: Carlos Nazario and Gerry O’Kane. Tailor: Willy Guillochin. Hair assistant: David Harborow. Makeup assistant: Anne Amerighi

lead_paragraph: Cate Blanchett is known for playing women who are just barely holding it together. In life, she’s firmly in control.
